text: @NYGovCuomo #cuomo claims NY started counting “probable” deaths to their #COVID19 death toll because of the CDC yet they said back in early April they wanted to start counting people who die at home with no test or seen by a doctor.theyve already added 10k to the list https://t.co/JMt038FShe
